channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A New Jersey lawsuit shows how hard it is to fight deepfake porn
item.description: For more than two years, an app called ClothOff has been terrorizing young women online — and it’s been maddeningly difficult to stop. The app has been taken down from the two major app stores and it’s banned from most social platforms, but it’s still available on the web and through a Telegram bot. In […]

item.title: Avec ses AI Overviews, Google joue avec la santé des internautes
item.description: Les AI Overviews de Google ne sont pas toujours de bon conseil. En particulier quand il s'agit de répondre à des questions d'ordre médical. Le géant du web a retiré plusieurs réponses jugées dangereuses, mais il reste encore beaucoup de travail et de questions autour de la problématique de la santé par l'IA.

item.title: Good news Copilot haters - some of you will finally be able to disable the AI tool on your work device at last
item.description: Admins can now remove the free Copilot app, but only if they're a paying M365 Copilot customer...and it can still be reinstalled anyway.

item.title: J’ai vu la Rolls Royce des nouveaux PC ultraportable chez MSI
item.description: MSI a profité du CES 2026 pour insister sur sa nouvelle identité Prestige. Non, le constructeur ne fait pas que des produits orientés jeux vidéo. Le MSI Prestige 13 AI est l'une des stars du salon.

item.title: Amazon has started automatically upgrading Prime members to Alexa Plus
item.description: Over the past couple of weeks, users on the r/alexa subreddit have reported getting automatically upgraded to Alexa Plus as a perk for their Prime memberships. The update doesn't appear to be opt-in, but there's an option to roll it back. Screenshots of a message from Amazon sent to users state that, "After your device […]

item.title: True blue: 20 items for your eclectic 0000FF assemblage to work from home
item.description: Everything you need to bring a flash of color to your WFH workspace.

item.title: Netflix had a huge night at the 2026 Golden Globes with 7 wins
item.description: As Netflix gears up to acquire Warner Bros., the streaming giant took home 7 awards at the Golden Globes last night.

item.title: Apple surpasses Samsung to become the worlds number one smartphone maker
item.description: New data from Counterpoint has Apple as the world's top smartphone maker, ahead of Samsung.

item.title: Les produits Xiaomi ne sont pas épargnés lors des soldes d’hiver : voici les 9 meilleurs deals
item.description: Xiaomi reste un acteur incontournable du marché de la Tech. Comme chaque année, le constructeur chinois participe aux soldes d'hiver et se démarque en proposant des offres attractives sur ses smartphones, objets connectés et téléviseurs — sans oublier son tout nouveau modèle Poco, déjà disponible en promotion.

item.title: Hackers are going after top LLM services by cracking misconfigured proxies
item.description: Major hacking campaign identified vulnerable servers and underlying LLM systems.

item.title: Soundcore AeroFit 2 Pro, des écouteurs hybrides conjuguant confort ouvert et réduction de bruit qui veulent faire mieux que les AirPods
item.description: Présentés au CES 2026 de Las Vegas, les nouveaux écouteurs true wireless de Soundcore promettent de résoudre l'équation complexe entre maintien optimal, design non intrusif et isolation acoustique grâce à une architecture modulable inédite.

item.title: This Documentary Takes You Inside the Very Real World of Competitive Lightsaber Duels (Exclusive)
item.description: Titled 'Saber,' the new film explores a fascinating niche of 'Star Wars' fandom.

item.title: The Lego Pokémon Kanto Region Badge Collection is free when you pre-order the new Venusaur, Charizard, and Blastoise set
item.description: The Lego Pokémon Kanto Region Badge Collection is a free gift with purchase of the new Venusaur, Charizard, and Blastoise set.

item.title: The first three Lego Pokémon sets launch in February and include a $650 diorama
item.description: After teasing its first collaboration with the Pokémon franchise last March but sharing very few details, Lego's first Pokémon sets are now available for preorder through the company's online store. The cheapest of the three is an articulated version of Eevee, but there's also a budget-busting set featuring Charizard, Blastoise, and Venusaur that's a whopping […]...

item.title: The RingConn Gen 2 is on sale for under $240 at Amazon and the health-tracking subscription is free
item.description: The RingConn Gen 2 is on sale at Amazon for $239.20, down from the list price of $299. That's a 20% discount.

item.title: Cloudflare CEO threatens to pull servers from Italy after AGCOM's €14M fine
item.description: Cloudflare has been hit with a massive fine from Italian authorities for refusing to block pirate sites on its public DNS. CEO Matthew Prince has responded with a furious rebuttal, threatening to pull the company's physical presence from Italy entirely.

item.title: A Palworld trading card game is coming this summer
item.description: Palworld, the monster-hunting action / adventure game known for its originality, is getting into the trading card business. Pocketpair announced today that it has partnered with Bushiroad - the company behind the Weiss Schwarz and Shadowverse: Evolve trading card games - to produce a new TCG featuring creatures from Palworld due out on July 30th. […]...

item.title: India is proposing another far-reaching security rule for smartphones
item.description: India is considering new smartphone security rules that would require device makers to allow government access to source code for “vulnerability analysis.” It would also require companies to notify the government of major software updates and security patches before rollout, according to Reuters. This is the latest in a raft of unprecedented proposals by the Indian government under the guise of security, as it weighs making a package of 83 security standards drafted in 2023 legally binding in the world’s second-largest smartphone market with nearly 750 million smartphones. Under the proposals,...

item.title: Apple's Siri AI will be powered by Gemini
item.description: Apple has confirmed reports that it will use Google Gemini’s models to help it power the new version of Siri and other generative AI features. “After careful evaluation, we determined that Google’s technology provides the most capable foundation for Apple Foundation Models and we’re excited about the innovative new experiences it will unlock for our users,” Apple said in a statement obtained by CNBC. Apple first demoed a genAI version of Siri back at WWDC 2024. In March 2025, the company said it was delaying a major Siri update until this year, but it appears that Apple is not quite ready to p...

item.title: Lego's brand-new Star Wars Smart Play sets are up for preorder, and I've tried all 3
item.description: Lego's first three Star WarsSmart Play sets are now up for preorder ahead of the official March 1, 2026, launch, starting at $69.99 / £59.99 / AU$99.99.

item.title: Les montres connectées sont en forte promotion durant les soldes : les 7 bonnes affaires à retenir
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver permettent de faire de bonnes affaires sur de nombreux produits Tech, dont les montres connectées ! Ces accessoires lifestyle & sport profitent eux aussi d’une vague de promotions : voici les offres à retenir.

item.title: Gemini de Google sera le cerveau du futur Siri d’Apple
item.description: Apple a fini par trouver le chevalier blanc qui sauvera Siri des affres de la médiocrité : ça sera Gemini de Google. Les négociations qui duraient depuis des mois entre les deux entreprises ont en effet abouti. Il est grand temps : le nouveau Siri personnalisé basé sur l'IA devait sortir au printemps dernier.

item.title: Monarch Money is offering 50 percent off its budgeting app for new users
item.description: The start of the new year is a great time to get your finances in order, and a good budgeting app can help with that. Instead of laboring over a spreadsheet, you can try one of our favorite budgeting apps for less than usual. Monarch Money is running a sale that gives new users 50 percent off one year of the service, bringing the final cost down to just $50. Just use the code NEWYEAR2026 at checkout to get the discount. Monarch Money makes for a capable and detailed budgeting companion. You can use the service via apps for iOS, Android, iPadOS or the web, and Monarch also offers a Chrome exten...

item.title: Samsungs 77-inch entry-level OLED 4K TV is over $1,400 off at Amazon
item.description: Amazon has the Samsung 77-inch S85F OLED 4K TV on sale for just $1,597.99. That's nearly half off its list price.

item.title: Throw away these recalled dietary supplements right now. They may contain a ‘life-threatening’ ingredient
item.description: Sold for over a period of three years, a product that claimed to offer “mental clarity” might cause serious side effects, according to an FDA notice. Fitness brand Modern Warrior has voluntarily recalled all lots of its dietary supplement Modern Warrior Ready after testing revealed the presence of “undeclared ingredients,” one of which could be potentially life threatening. ...

item.title: Fin des surtaxes sur les voitures électriques chinoises : l’Europe change de stratégie, voici ce qui remplace les 35 %
item.description: L'Europe vient peut-être d'éviter une guerre commerciale totale, mais à quel prix ? Bruxelles propose officiellement de remplacer les droits de douane punitifs sur les voitures électriques chinoises par des prix minimums obligatoires. Une "main tendue" qui ressemble surtout à un ultimatum économique déguisé.

item.title: Apple picks Google’s Gemini AI for its big Siri upgrade
item.description: Apple will use Google's Gemini AI model to power a more personalized Siri coming this year. "After careful evaluation, we determined that Google's technology provides the most capable foundation for Apple Foundation Models and we're excited about the innovative new experiences it will unlock for our users," Apple said in a statement provided to CNBC. […]...

item.title: A beginners guide to sexting
item.description: Sexting can be fun and downright hot if done right. Here are tips from experts on how to get better at sexting.

item.title: En attendant la sortie des Note 15, Carrefour solde à -33% ce pack avec un Redmi 14 5G et des écouteurs Buds 6
item.description: Si vous cherchez un bon duo smartphone + écouteurs, Carrefour propose un pack Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 5G + Redmi Buds 6 pour 199,99 euros au lieu de 299,99 euros.

item.title: This 57-inch Samsung monitor is $800 off and its basically two 4K displays in one
item.description: As of Jan. 12, you can get the Samsung 57-inch Odyssey Neo G9 (G95NC) Series gaming monitor for $1,499.99 at Amazon.

item.title: Trump signals plans for ExxonMobil in Venezuela after White House meeting
item.description: A recent meeting with oil executives at the White House wasn’t entirely successful in efforts to ease concerns about Venezuela’s government. President Donald Trump said Sunday that he is “inclined” to keep ExxonMobil out of Venezuela after its top executive was skeptical about oil investment efforts in the country after the toppling of former President Nicolás Maduro.“I didn’t like Exxon’s response,” Trump said to reporters on Air Force One as he departed West Palm Beach, Florida. “They’re playing too cute.”During a meeting Friday with oil executives, Trump tried to assuage the concerns of the...

item.title: Trend Micro releases critical security fixes for Apex Central RCE - so patch now
item.description: A bug allowed hackers to inject DLLs without user interaction, gaining access to the underlying system.

item.title: Luminar lines up $22 million bidder for its lidar business
item.description: The bid comes from Quantum Computing Inc., which already lined up to buy Luminar's semiconductor division. Luminar founder Austin Russell has also expressed interest.

item.title: « On ne répond qu’à la moitié de la demande » : Micron justifie la fin de Crucial et enterre tout espoir avant 2028
item.description: Micron, qui a sacrifié sa célèbre marque Crucial sur l'autel de la rentabilité, tente de rassurer.

item.title: From Black Box to White Box: why AI agents shouldn’t be a mystery to enterprises
item.description: Why AI agents must be auditable, accountable, and governed to scale safely in the enterprise.

item.title: Gros bilan du CES 2026 dans Unlock Talk et une double Matinale Tech’ : notre programme Twitch de la semaine, c’est juste ici
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du lundi 12 janvier 2026, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous mercredi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter d'un Unlock Talk très porté sur le CES 2026.

item.title: C’est la grande braderie des PC portables gaming et bureautique : le TOP 8 des offres des soldes
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 ont démarré depuis près d'une semaine et on trouve de très belles offres, notamment du côté des PC portables. Que vous chercher une machine pour faire tourner vos jeux AAA ou d'un laptop ultrafin et performant pour bosser, vous devriez trouver votre bonheur dans cette sélection.

item.title: Rhea Seehorns Golden Globes speech is delightfully candid
item.description: Pluribus star Rhea Seehorn took home a win at the 83rd Golden Globe Awards, giving a delightfully candid speech.

item.title: Cette petite île de 15 000 habitants touche le jackpot sans rien faire grâce à l’IA
item.description: Une petite île de 15 000 habitants qui encaisse des dizaines de millions de dollars grâce à l’IA… sans entraîner un seul modèle ni fabriquer une puce : bienvenue à Anguilla, territoire britannique des Caraïbes dont la plus grande richesse, aujourd’hui, tient en deux lettres seulement : .ai.

item.title: Meta appoints ex-Trump and Bush official as its new president and vice chairman
item.description: Meta has appointed Dina Powell McCormick, a banking executive and former Republican White House official, as its new president and vice-chairman. The company said McCormick will help guide its overall strategy and execution as a part of the management team.“Dina’s experience at the highest levels of global finance, combined with her deep relationships around the world, makes her uniquely suited to help Meta manage this next phase of growth as the company’s president and vice chairman,” said Meta Founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg.McCormick was a partner at Goldman Sachs and ran its Global Soverei...

item.title: On pensait le projet mort, Intel ressuscite le 14A (1,4 nm)
item.description: Oubliez tout ce qu'on disait l'année dernière. En 2025, Intel menaçait de tout arrêter si personne ne signait pour sa gravure 14A. Au CES 2026, l'ambiance a radicalement changé. Le CEO Lip-Bu Tan est formel : le projet fonce à toute allure. La raison de ce miracle ? Une puce qui tient enfin ses promesses.

item.title: Les abeilles pourraient nous aider à communiquer avec des intelligences extraterrestres
item.description: Trouver des signes de l’existence d’une vie extraterrestre, c’est déjà compliqué. Et une fois que ce sera fait, encore faudra-t-il disposer de moyens de communiquer avec une telle intelligence. Pour nous y préparer, des chercheurs suggèrent que nous commencions par... apprendre à parler avec les...

item.title: Mattel’s latest Barbie to celebrate diversity has autism
item.description: Mattel partnered with the nonprofit Autistic Self Advocacy Network to develop the doll. Mattel Inc. is introducing an autistic Barbie on Monday as the newest member of its line intended to celebrate diversity, joining a collection that already includes Barbies with Down syndrome, a blind Barbie, a Barbie and a Ken with vitiligo, and other models the toymaker added to make its fashion dolls more inclusive.Mattel said it developed the autistic doll over more than 18 months in partnership with the Autistic Self Advocacy Network, a nonprofit organization that advocates for the rights and better me...

item.description: Luffy and the Straw Hats have some deadly new troubles ahead when 'One Piece' season two arrives in March.

item.title: What was the metaverse?
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg effectively declared its death last December. But the delusional fervor it inspired lives on. Late last year, Meta confirmed it would effectively be abandoning the metaverse, a nebulously defined project that spurred the company’s 2021 rebrand and has cost it over $70 billion since. At a strategy meeting at Mark Zuckerberg’s Hawaii compound, Reality Labs, the division responsible for the metaverse, was told to cut its budget by 30%, versus only 10% across the rest of the company. Reality Labs’ fate was arguably a long time coming: The division has never turned a profit, with cu...

item.title: Meta hires former Trump advisor Dina Powell McCormick as president and vice chair
item.description: Before joining Meta, Powell McCormick was working as deputy national security advisor to President Donald Trump.

item.description: Vous cherchez un bon casque pour accompagner votre Xbox Series X ou Series S ? Nous avons choisi pour vous les meilleurs casques sans fil et filaires pour les consoles de jeu Xbox.

item.title: Coup de filet contre un empire du cybercrime : 34 escrocs ont été arrêtés en Espagne
item.description: Black Axe, puissant réseau criminel nigérian reconverti dans la cyberfraude, s'est retrouvé dans le viseur de la police espagnole. Les autorités ont interpellé 34 suspects répartis entre Séville, Madrid, Malaga et Barcelone dans le cadre d'un nouveau coup de filet contre les pirates africains.

item.title: AMD n’est pas fermé une version « bêta » du FSR 4 pour les anciens GPU
item.description: AMD n'est pas fermé à porter le FSR 4 sur ses anciennes générations de cartes graphiques. Peut-être que les joueurs les auront à l'usure ?

item.title: 'Not even 3 minutes in and I'm annoyed': Stranger Things documentary further frustrates fans over hit Netflix show's divisive finale
item.description: Stranger Things fans have reacted negatively to a new docufilm that seemingly sheds light on season 5's troubled development.

item.title: Ces lunettes AR taillées pour le streaming et le gaming nomade sont soldées à moitié prix
item.description: Les RayNeo Air 3s sont des lunettes à réalité augmentée capables de déployer un immense écran virtuel de 201 pouces en Full HD à 120 Hz. Cette paire est nettement plus intéressante maintenant qu'elle passe de 299 euros à 155 euros.

item.description: Adorama's latest deal lets you bundle-in a free Fujifilm X-Half camera with the excellent Fujifilm X-T5 - one of the best gifts I've seen yet from the retailer.

item.title: Vibe coding is turning reporters into builders, and that’s a good thing for media
item.description: AI empowers creatives to experiment with storytelling. The challenge: turning that enthusiasm into a sustainable strategy. I teach AI to editorial and PR teams for a living, and if there’s one thing that excites and engages them more than any other, it’s vibe coding. The highly visual and interactive projects my students create with vibe-coding tools often turn me into the person taking notes....
